capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: The Jingguang Line is one of the busiest major railways in China.
sentences.chinese: 京廣線是中國最繁忙的鐵路骨幹之一。

sentences.english: The general conditions and layout character of the Chenzhou railway station in the Beijing-Guangzhou railway line are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了位於京廣線上郴州站的車站概況及佈局特點。

sentences.english: Near the 3rd ring road, near to Kerry Centre and Jing Guang Center.
sentences.chinese: 靠近三環路的嘉裏中心和京廣中心。

sentences.english: Heavy snowfall in provinces to the north had cut off parts of the busy railway line that starts in the city and ends in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 連日的暴雪已經切斷了繁忙的京廣鐵路線的部分路段。

sentences.english: The Beijing-Guangzhou Railway traverses almost half of China.
sentences.chinese: 京廣鐵路幾乎穿越大半個中國。

sentences.english: Khodorkovsky and even the adjacent high-speed Jing-Guang Railroad, transportation to facilitate faster.
sentences.chinese: 毗鄰連霍高速和京廣鐵路，交通運輸便利快捷。
